metadata.title: CVE-2022-26564 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HotelDruid Hotel Management Software v3.0.3 contains a cross-site scripting(XSS) vulnerability via the prezzoperiodo4 parameter in creaprezzi.php.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
